values:
Oh gosh, it's been some time since I have even glanced at this page, let alone post to it.  I don't even think anyone knows of this account.  

I have surgery in 4 days.  Kinda scarred, but not because I feel like I'm going to die or anything.  I've just never experienced this before.  3 inches of small intestine, my appendix, and any other disease ridden are of my bowels to be looking for a new residency soon.

Tammy and I are moving forward on our business plan.  We've been driving across the state looking at game stores, looking at the characteristics of each, analyzing them for what they lack.  I really think my game store idea will take off.  I'm not expecting/thinking that it will become a multi-million dollar industry.  I just want a good solid foundation to base the rest of my life and my family's life off of.  Something my children can have one day - someplace where I never have to work for another asshole again.  A place where I can bring an experience that will catch the interests of many gamers in the area.  We are looking at vacant commercial warehouses right now.  This place will be wall to wall with gaming tables, food stuff (for late night forays), and all the gaming accessories a person could need.  Yes, there are many game stores in the Indianapolis and surrounding areas, but all of them lack elements that appeal to a gamer.  We'll play even if we are elbow to elbow, but it's nice knowing you have some room to relax.  

I hate my job.  They basically told me that I have no job security while I'm out the 6 weeks for my surgery.  They told me that they'd offer me a position once I was able to return, but if they fill it while I'm gone I'm S.O.L.  I haven't been here for a year so FMLA doesn't cover me.  Fuckers.  On top of that they accuse me of trying to steal time away from work by using my VACATION time two days prior to my surgery.  "Why?" they ask.  Because I'm going to be down for 6 weeks and need to get some shit together!  Jesus Christ.  

Anyway.  That's all I have for now.

Do any of you feel like a machine, in a world full of monotony, watching the cogs and gears turn in their endless motions.  Looks a lot like your life, right?  Well I have a little something to say about that....

When the world dies, the cities crumble, the gears stop turning, burry me in its ashes and call it quits.  Leave all your possesions, for they own you; your passions which become an endless endeavor to us all.  In the end, they will never matter.  Will we matter when it all ends; once the final whistle blows and humanity is digested like all the other materials in the universe.  Afterall, we are all made of stardust; we will return.  

We are not the so called "diamonds in the rough."  We are all copies of eachother, with subtle differences but each a piece of decaying matter.  We are attached to our beliefs, or own ideas which will die when there is no one else to hear them.  you are no different from the matter next to you.

Some of us are born hopeful for a world torn apart by hatred and greed.  The corrupt rule the world.  They rule our lives and there is nothing we can do about it.  Elect the politician that says he'll make a change.  He's lying.  Real politics lives in us.  And it is dead idea.  Freedom...it doesn't exist.  Some of us are born despising the very fabric of our own existence.  Others come to this conclusion during their lives but surely it is too late.  Then there are Othrers come into the world with hope.  Are they the enlightened ones?  Maybe.  Or are they just poor souls that know one world but are blind slave to another?  

I just thought you'd like to know.

I would appreciate comments on this for it is quite a stiring entry.  Probably my worst.  Fuck it. 

Think.  Belive.  Slave.  Machine.  Who are you?

again, it's been a while.  no change in that.  i always forget about this journal.  nothing new.  i hate my job, which i got after hating my other one.  i just hate work.  is there a job that doesn't suck?  if i could make one up then it would be great.

i'm gone.  i'm so gone.  it'll be a while before things get back to where they should be.  i'm numb, dumb, and anybody else.  

here, pop a beer and chug a pill.  it'll make it all ok.  

save her.
The disco ball is on fire and my clothes are in rags.  Lets dance baby, before the night is gone.
It sure has been a while.  Might be again.  Who knows.  I don't think anyone I know reads it anyway.  Things are the same.
I'm going to burry myself alive for you.  Maybe that'll help.  You can't hear the screaming when i'm six feet under.  Let's just hope it's not too long.

This goes to anyone who knows me and reads this, but mainly to you.  I wish you could trully understand what's going on, but frankly, i'm glad it's me and not you.  I have to fight this.  It's time for the big push.  This is either a hit or miss.  If I win then I can stand proud again, finally being able to make something of myslef.  But at this point I am nothing.  I can't be something for you when I can't be something for myself.  I really care about you and I am torn up inside thinking about how you will handle this.  But please just understand.  It's what I have to do.  I need to get my shit back in order.  I'm sinking right now and I don't want to take anyone with me.  

I'd shoot myself to love you...
But if I loved myself I'd be shooting you...

Yep, pretty much how I feel about myself.  Whatever the fuck.  I have made quite a mess.  I just want to get my feet on the ground and be normal, like everyone else.

You can tell me the speed of light, but do you know the speed of pain?  There's a fucking crack in my heart driving me insane.  It seems the malady that has conquered my mind has afflicted other vital organs, in a metaphysical way.  It seems that i'm digging my own grave.  Whatever the fuck.  

I don't care if your world is ending today.  I wasn't invited anyway.  You said I tasted famous so I drew you a heart, but I'm not an artist - i'm a fucking work of art.  You wanted perfect?  You got your perfect.  Now I'm to perfect for someone like you.  Was I dandy in your ghetto with a snow white smile?  But you'll never be as perfect whatever you do.  I wish I could be like you.  But I lied when I said I was perfect.  I'm just a "dirty-dirty rockstar" wanna be.  

What the fuck am I doing and why am I doing it?  Please...tell me...  

I'll pretend that I want you for what is on the inside, but once I get inside you I'll just want to get out.  Get out while you still can...

You don't know what lethargic or depraved mean untill you have trully come to terms with them.  

I hate sleepless nights.

I can't fucking sleep.  

Maybe this is our last day on Earth.  I'm staying up for the fireworks.  

I'm so empty, here without you.  I know they want me dead.  

Fuck.

When one world ends something else begins, but without a scream.  Just a whisper because we just start it over and over again.  
I've got a crush on a pretty pistol.  Should I tell her that I feel this way?  My father always taught me to be faithful.  I have love songs in my head, killing us away.  She tells me that I'm a pretty bullet and that i'll be a star someday.  A pretty bullet...an imitation Christ...
Sorry your Sunday smiles are rusty nails and your crucifixion commercials failed.  But I'm just a pitiful anonymous.
My mouth is a crib and it's growing lies.  I didn't know what love was on that day.  My heart's a tiny bloodclot, I picked at it, it never heals, it never goes away.  

This was never my world.
The System is down.

I don't care if your world is ending today
I wasn't invited to it anyway
You said I tasted famous, so I drew you a heart
But now I'm not an artist I'm a FUCKING work of art
I've got an F and a C and I got a K too
And the only thing missing is a bitch like you

You wanted perfekt
You got your perfekt
But now I'm too perfekt for someone like you
I was a dandy in your ghetto with
A snow white smile and you'll
Never be as perfekt whatever you do

FUCK.

I'm on my way down now, i'd like take you with me.
The minute that it's born, it begins to die.  
I'd love to just give in.  I'd love to live this lie...

This fucking sucks.  Fuck.  

I can't live this lie.

I had a dream that you went away with me.  We left this place and went some where that we didn't belong, but we liked it anyway.  I wished you were a Queen, just for a day.  The sky was red, like a giant flame, consuming the world.  But we were ok.  We had eachother.  You held my hand and whispered something in my ear.  But it was already to late.  

Here we are again, awake in my bed, with our eyes closed to the things happening around us.  Brace yourself...  
"We can lie on our bed and imagine ourselves away..."

It's time to fill the mind fuck.
There's something cold and blank behind that smile.  She's standing on an overpass in a miracle mile.  Cause you were from a perfect world, a world thats threw me away today...
When the world dies, burry me in it and call it quits.  It's not worth the struggle, in the end.  You don't need to bring anything with you.

I've reached a terrible point.
I've done some terrible things.
I've learned, that if done correctly, it can be painless.  
Kinda crazy...fucked up...but painless.
I'm going to loose it anyway.

This sucks.

It's all coming back, again.  I was stupid to think that I could do this on my own, without their help...but I never felt like they really helped.  They felt like they were doing more hurt than anything.  I hate feeling sick all the fucking time.  And this is supposed to feel better?  Then I am told "We'll, we don't know what to do right now...it may take some time."  Ok, I understand that I have dealt with this for sometime and waiting a little longer shouldnt be that big of a deal...but it is.  I go to get help, I shouldn't just be fucked around with.  "Give us four weeks..."  That's how it always is. 
"I don't like the drugs but the drugs like me."
Fuck 'em when you try to help them.  They ask for it but don't listen when it is given.  Why care when they don't care at all.  Just smile and light the flame...

The Ocean is a Terrible Rage

There's a man in the lighthouse
Singing your name
He's all alone
Bringing the ships home

He's been loyal, He's been true
To every word he's said to you
So where have you gone?
While he sings your lonely song

Lost to the black
The violent and the waves
Forever hidden
Offshore, far away

Grey clouds are forming
off shore, in the distance
The waters are raging
And turning the seas...

And the ships come home
At the end of the day
Cargo aboard, saftely ashore
The only things lost 
to the prowd black sea
Is your soul and
The heart lighthouse

There's a man in the Lighthouse
Singing a song
He's all alone
When will you come home

We spent some time
together walking
Spent some time just talking
about who we were
You held my hand so
very tightly
And told me what we
could be dreaming of

There's nothing like you and I

We spent some time
together drinking
Spent some time just thinking
about days of joy
As our hearts started
beating faster
I recalled your laughter
from long ago

There's nothing like you and I

I just got from playing laser tag with Matt, Sabrina, Nic, and Alex.  My freakin' gun didn't work half the time...pissed me off.  There were way to many little kids there.  We used a couple that were on our team as decoy's.  For some odd reason they enjoyed it.  I did absolutley nothing today..and it was great.  I put in For A Few Dollars More, an old Clint Western, which put me to sleep off and on.  It was nice.  It seems I eat a lot on my days off.  Always making trips to the kitchen and finding something...  I feel fat lol.  

I have to say, the last week and a half has been purely amazing ;)  I have been able to stop taking my meds and feel find whilst doing so.  I feel like I have been given a second chance to make things right and to do it the right way.  So many things have fallen into place.  I don't know where to start...so I probably won't.  I will say that the particular someone that I met is amazing.  I don't even know what to say about her other than that.  She is just amazing.  And her brownies are delicious, overcooked or not hehe.  Ordering Chinese is becoming my favorite pasttime btw hehe  Can't beat good ol' China King and a Killian's Irish Red Beer.  Mmmmm...  I am sorry I talk in my sleep..maybe one day I will say something worth while lol  We should run away...to Somewhere Only We Know...;)

I heard a song that I had not heard for quite some time today.  I was looking through my playlist and found a remix of Sex Bomb by Tom Jones.  It is freakin great.  I have come to the conclusion that Tom Jones is the dirtiest man in history.  I would attempt to justify this claim, but anyone reading this knows it is true.  The man is just nasty.  Old women love him...it's so wrong.  If you are interested in hearing this song, ask me and I will send it to you.  So yeah...I will be taking my leave now.  Goodnight Indianapolis.

A lot going on.  I've been having a great time hanging out with someone ;)  Hrmmm, I should write more, but I really don't have much to talk about.  So yeah, i'll leave that to the pros.  Later folks.

So, last night was interesting.  I am not proud of this, but I got so drunk...  I had a hang over this morning, but I am over it now.  I didn't get to bed till nearly 4:30.  Yeah, so not very proud.  I will say that I was able to get rid of some excess emotional strain.  (at least I hope I have)  She knows she can not treat me like that anymore.  I am proud that I finally spoke my mind.  So yeah, both proud and not proud of my actions last night.  Go figure.  

I have an amazing amount of random ideas lately.  Good for the writing thing I think I can do.  Happy about that.

Health wise things are the same...  maybe worse, but oh well.

Hrmm...

Don't have much to write at the moment.  

"A shadow and a doubt consume my mind.  Fear rises from deep within me.  What if the devil has come for me this night?  My hands begin to tremble and sweat runs down my face.  The candle still burns.  I am safe while there is light.  I can not let the shadows take me...I can not let them have me..."

The car's on fire and there's no driver at the wheel
and the sewers are all muddied with a thousand lonely suicides
and a dark wind blows.

The goverment is corrupt 
and we are all so many drunks with the radio on and the curtains drawn.
We are traped in the belly of this horrible machine
and the machine is bleeding to death.

The sun has fallen down
and the billboards are all leering
and the flags are all dead 
at the top of their poles.

It went like this:
The buildings all toppled in on themselves
mothers clutching babies
picked through the rubble
and pulled out their hair.

The skyline was beautful on fire;
all twisted metal stretching upwards,
everything washed in a thin orange haze

I said "Kiss me your beautiful, these are trully the last days."

You grabbed my hand and we fell into it 
like a day dream or a fever

We woke up one morning 
and fell a little further down
as sure as the valley of death
I opened up my wallet
and it was full of blood.

Just when I thought it couldn't get worse...just when I thought I was getting better...I get knocked down.  Boy o boy is it bad.  If only someone realized what was going on; someone to help me.  But alas, I have to face this alone.  The problem here is that everyone seems to think that this is something easily remedied(sp?).  I laugh.  No one knows what pain is.  No one can understand.  How far do I have to fall before I hit the bottom?

I have no idea what is going on.  Someone please tell me what it is that I am supposed to be doing?  I've started to think about things.  I think the doctor put me on medication without really evaluating me on what is wrong.  She has taken a freakin month to get me in for blood tests (which are on this coming Monday).  I talked to my dad the other night.  His docotor told him that there is nothing more that they can do for him.  What is that supposed to mean?  That they are giving up?  I hate doctors.  Their answer to everything is "well, I can give you this drug..."  What a bullshit answer.  They want to make you a zombie so you can deal with whats wrong with you rather than really trying to solve the problem.  Or at least get a step closer to what's really wrong.  I'm afraid of having the blood tests.  What if I have the same problems that my father has?  What does that mean to me?  Hmm...let's not think about that.  

She leaned over to his ear and whispered, "I love you...I think I would do anything for you."  He asked her what she meant.  She said she didn't know.  He looked into her beatiful brown eyes and began the journey that he took whenever she was near.  He always got lost in those eyes.  Slowly, sleep took him.  When he opened his eyes again, she was gone.  There was a note on the table; she was gone.  "It's better this way," he told himself.  He didn't mean it.

It's been a long while since I have written in here.  For a while I had deleted this account.  Who knows why.  I guess I got tired of the only communication I had with some people was via internet.  I missed it though...I missed some of you.  You know who you are.  So yeah.  The world of Jeremy officially sucks.  I don't even know where to start. I don't know where I was last time I ever said anything.  
  I always felt sick before and I found out why.  I finally went to the doctor and told them what was really up...  So now I'm on meds that make me feel worse.  It won't last long they say.  It's supposed to make me feel normal or something.  Whatever.  I think that's why I dissapeared for a while.  Because of how I felt and all.  Oh well, I guess it'll all be good.  Like anyone cares where I was anyway lol
  School really sucks.  I've been sick a lot; most of my teacher understand.  It still sucks...I was doing well.  I've been ok all my other semesters...I guess it's ok that I had a hard one.  This summer is going to be so nice.  I can't wait.  I feel like i'm already living it.  
  I was really torn up about R before.  A lot of my messages where about her and how I missed or what not.  I was such an idiot.  She is a bitch.  Why could I not realize it?  All she ever did was hurt me, I always came back for more.  A few close friends made me realize it a while ago.  So it's all good.  In fact, i'm glad it happened.  It was about time.  Three years of doing that shit to myself.  I think i'm a better person now.  I feel different...almost lighter.  I dunno how to explain it.  It's good though, to forget the past and start working on the future.  
  I want to speak to someone in particular for a moment.  When you read this you'll know it was for you.  I miss talking to you on the phone.  We spent a lot of time talking.  You really made me feel better about all the bad things.  Don't think I don't call because I don't want to talk.  My phone died and I lost all my numbers.  I thought you would call...  I guess I was afraid to ask for your number again.  Yeah... so.  For some reason I think about you a lot.  Dunno what that means.  We need to do the dinner/movie thing.  It's killing me thinking about it lol.  You know we would have fun.  Then medieval times!  WOOO  haha.  And your leaving soon...so I think we should do something.  Just so we can not have regret for not having done it.  If it matters to you anyway.  It sure think it would be cool.  So yeah...  grrr.
  I've been so confused about everything.  It's like I have been given a new life and I don't know where to start fixing the things that were bad before.  It's a great feeling, except that I don't know where to start.  That's part of the game...finding out what to do.  I look forward to it.  Confused, but a little confusion never hurt anyone.  
  I think that's a lot for now.  So yeah.  Take care all.  Later
It's been a while, but i'm back.  If it matters at all.  A lot has happened.  Good and bad.  So yeah... I'll post more later.
